network_overview: The capture shows a 4G LTE control-plane only trace: 100 % of S1-AP, X2-AP and GTP-C transactions are failing with Diameter Result-Code 2001 (DIAMETER_SUCCESS) yet the KPI engine marks them as unsuccessful, while no user-plane GTP-U tunnels, IMS signalling or voice calls are present. Traffic is low-rate steady heartbeat signalling between MME, eNB and PGW with no radio bearers actually being established.

observations.finding: All 64 control-plane procedures (S1-AP Proc-11/13/23, Diameter Cmd-316/318/324) are flagged with 0 % success despite every answer carrying Diameter Result-Code 2001, indicating a KPI-tool mis-configuration rather than a protocol failure.

Zero GTP-U tunnels were created (no TEID allocation) and no SIP/VoLTE signalling is seen, so the trace is pure idle-mode keep-alive and initial-attach signalling with no active data or voice sessions.
No IMS registrations, SIP calls or RTP streams present; voice service is completely unused during the 11-min window.

root_causes.issue: KPI-tool false-negative due to Result-Code 2001 mis-interpretation
root_causes.description: The analytics module treats Diameter Result-Code 2001 (success) as a failure, driving all calculated success rates to 0 % even though each request received an affirmative answer.
root_causes.impact: Inflates alarm dashboards and may hide real failures; no actual subscriber impact.

recommendations.action: Correct the KPI-tool rule-set: map Diameter Result-Code 2001 to SUCCESS and re-calculate KPIs.
recommendations.rationale: Removes false alarms and restores accurate health reporting for S6a/S13/Cx interfaces.

recommendations.action: Enable periodic GTP-U echo requests on S-GW and verify TEID allocation in next drive-test to confirm data-plane readiness.
recommendations.rationale: Ensures that when users attach, bearers can actually transport traffic.

recommendations.action: Capture a parallel user-plane trace (GTP-U on S1-U/S5) during busy hour to validate throughput and packet-loss baselines.
recommendations.rationale: Provides complete visibility beyond the current control-only snapshot.

session_analysis.signaling_health: SCTP associations remain stable (no ABORT/SHUTDOWN) and Diameter answers return instantly (<40 ms), but KPI reporting is misleading due to 2001→failure mapping.
session_analysis.user_plane_health: No GTP-U tunnels exist; user plane is idle. DNS bursts inside CG-NAT are local resolver replies, not subscriber traffic.
session_analysis.voice_quality: No SIP, RTP or IMS signalling detected; voice service dormant.
session_analysis.cross_plane_correlation: Control-plane only; no bearer establishment means no user-plane correlation possible.

sequence_diagram:
sequenceDiagram
    participant UE
    participant eNB as 10.233.39.38
    participant MME as 10.47.19.6
    participant HSS as 10.47.9.68
    UE->>eNB: RRC Connection Request
    eNB->>MME: S1-AP Proc-11 Initial UE Message
    MME->>HSS: Diameter Cmd-318 Update-Location-Request
    HSS-->>MME: Cmd-318 Answer Result-Code 2001
    Note over MME,KPI: KPI logs 2001 as failure → 0 % success
    MME->>eNB: S1-AP Proc-13 Initial Context Setup
    eNB-->>MME: S1-AP Proc-13 Response
    Note over UE,MME: No GTP-U tunnel created → bearerless
